fields.helptext: The information you list on this page will be publically displayed. Don't enter anything you would prefer to keep private

fields.label: Company Name
fields.helptext: The name of the company or organization that manages the product

fields.label: Product Version
fields.helptext: A version number to help users identify their exact version of the product

fields.label: Contact Name
fields.helptext: An name of a contact person at the company or organization that manages the product

fields.label: Contact Email
fields.helptext: The email for the contact person

fields.label: Contact Phone
fields.helptext: The phone number for the contact person.
